All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, QueryResultDisplay, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SkycatCatalogTree
public class CatalogTree
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements QueryResultDisplay

Used to display a catalog hierarchy.

See Also:
Serialized Form

          This utility class is used to load a catalog file or URL in a background thread.

Constructor Detail

CatalogTree

public CatalogTree()
Create a CatalogTree. If you use this constructor, you need to call setQueryResultHandler() later to set the object used to interpret URL query results.

CatalogTree

public CatalogTree(QueryResultHandler queryResultHandler)
Create a CatalogTree and use the given argument to interpret URL query results.
